definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Faustus summons Helen again and exclaims rapturously about her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 浮士德再度召喚海倫並震懾於她的秀麗。

sentences.english: The first time I visited Lake Louise, I was stunned by its beauty.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次去露易斯湖時，就震懾於它的美麗。

sentences.english: Their nuclear deterrents will be more greatly relied on.
sentences.chinese: 他們將更多的依賴核震懾。

sentences.english: One of the robbers fired two shots at the ceiling to warn the store's security guards.
sentences.chinese: 期間一名劫匪朝天花板連開兩槍以震懾商場保安。

sentences.english: Indeed, that ebony painting board goes far back in history and inspires awe.
sentences.chinese: 確實，那黝黑的漆板淵穆幽深，震懾心魂。

sentences.english: This offers no support for the notion of deterrence.
sentences.chinese: 結果並不支持死刑有震懾作用的想法。

sentences.english: The two boxers gazed at each other, wanting to stare down the opposite party.
sentences.chinese: 兩名拳手互相瞪着眼睛，想以此震懾住對方。

sentences.english: King Pyrrhus of Epirus used elephants as a shock tactic against his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 伊庇魯斯國王皮拉斯對敵會出動大象，以收震懾效果。

sentences.english: The awful despot’s chances of survival lie with his deterrent power.
sentences.chinese: 這位可怕暴君的存亡懸於震懾力的有無。
你自己感覺到這種震懾力了嗎？

sentences.english: Death penalty is a deterrent to violent crimes.
sentences.chinese: 死刑是對暴力犯罪的一種震懾力。

sentences.english: The most recent international sanctions appear to have little or no effect on North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 最新的國際仲裁似乎對朝鮮毫無震懾力。
是英國皇家海軍可怕的震懾力？

definition: variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to shake up/to deal a shock/(fig.) to stir (sb's heart)
